DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection URL (required). Get from Railway PostgreSQL service.

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Secret token for webhook validation (optional but recommended)

JWT_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for JWT tokens (32+ characters, use openssl rand -hex 32)

MNEMONIC_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Fernet key for encrypting wallet mnemonics. Generate with: python -c 'from cryptography.fernet import Fernet; print(Fernet.generate_key().decode())'

ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins. Example: https://app.example.com,https://another.example.com

DATABASE_ECHO.description: Log all SQL queries (false for production)

LOG_LEVEL.description: Python logging level (INFO, DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR)
